generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Should You Get the 2020 Ford Explorer? The article is likely to discuss aspects such as safety ratings, fuel efficiency, interior space, and technology offerings, providing insights that can help you determine if the Ford Explorer meets your family’s needs.
